definition of persian gulflearner persian gulf english persian gulf american persian gulf trends persian gulfproper noun the persian gulf is the area of sea between saudi arabia and iran cobuild advanced english dictionary copyright © harper collins publishers persian gulfin britishnouna shallow arm of the arabian sea between sw iran and arabia linked with the arabian sea by the strait of hormuz and the gulf of oman important for the oilfields on its shores area 233 000 sq km 90 000 sq milescollins english dictionary copyright © harper collins publishers persian gulfin americanarm of the arabian sea between sw iran  arabia c 90000 sq mi 233099 sq kmwebster’s new world college dictionary 4th edition copyright © 2010 by houghton mifflin harcourt all rights reserved trends of persian
